text: Come here for a delicious slice of hostility and rudeness. I've never been treated so badly before in my life. I'll never return. The woman with the black hair basically lectured and then yelled at me for trying to order something off their menu. What a whack job.
One of the best pizza places around. Every time I have ordered from there, the pizzas were excellent.

Ordered the party pizza with half meat lovers , half supreme and 20 wings.  Filled with great tasty fresh toppings and perfect sauce.  Could not stop eating these perfect pizzas.  Wings were savory and yummy.
